description: This historic restaurant, run by the same family for many years, is situated right on the lake (with its own private mooring), which can be best appreciated from the charming veranda. The current owner-chef has retained the cuisine’s classic style, while adding his own contemporary touch to top-quality meat and fish dishes (including freshwater fish).
facilitiesServices: ['Air conditioning', 'Car park', 'Garden or park', 'Great view', 'Terrace', 'Wheelchair access']
